description.p: Ariel is a cross-platform LV2 plugin host built with GTK4 and lilv. It provides a user-friendly interface for loading and managing LV2 plugins with real-time audio processing capabilities.
Major release with comprehensive file parameter support

ul.li: Multi-file parameter plugin support (Ratatouille, Neural Amp Modeler)
Enhanced file dialogs with support for .wav, .nam, .ir, .json formats
Thread-safe file loading with jalv-style message queuing
Improved buffer management and atom message handling
